Package scenegraph

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenegraph.AbstSceneObject
      • scenegraph.AbstNode
        • scenegraph.AbstSpatial
          • scenegraph.AbstGeometry
            • scenegraph.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ChannelInterface
    public class Line
extends AbstGeometry
    Class for polygon lines. The line is specified by an array of vertices which are connected with each other by a line.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ursula Derichs

    • Field Summary

      Constructs a polygonal line by sampling a 3D function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line​(java.lang.String name)
        Constructs an empty line
        Parameters:
        name - name of the line object

      • Line

        public Line​(Vec3[] vertices)
        Constructs a line consisting of vertices that are connected with each other in the order of their position in the array.
        Parameters:
        vertices - array of line polygon vertices

      • Line

        public Line​(float[] positions)
        Constructs a line by connecting the vertices that are connected with each other. Vertices are given in the form of positions, each position consists of 3 float values.
        Parameters:
        positions - array of vertex position data. Each vertex is made up of 3 values (representing the x, y, z, coordinates of the vertex).

      • Line

        public Line​(FunctionR1Vec3 func,
            int samples,
            float min,
            float max)
        Constructs a polygonal line by sampling a 3D function.
        Parameters:
        func - 3D function assigns a vertex to each value
        samples - number of samples within the function's interval
        min - left interval border for the sampling
        max - right interval border for the sampling

      • Line

        public Line​(Line obj)
        Copy Constructor
        Parameters:
        obj - object to be copied
